participant_1.background:
I'm going to have a nice lazy weekend with Toto.
I'm going to miss the sun and the beach, but I'm ready to focus on my studies.
my mom teaches kindergarten and my dad is a tax assessor.

participant_2.background:
I have been single for a while now and enjoy spending my time fishing and relaxing.
I like to play pretend with my daughter.
I enjoy working with my hands and making beautiful jewelry.
i own a ford truck.
i m very familiar with hospitals and doctors.

content.text: Hello there! How are you doing this fine day?
I'm doing pretty well. Just got back from a long day of fishing. How about you?
I'm doing well too! I'm just finishing up some paintings for a show I'm in.
Oh that sounds exciting! What kind of paintings do you do?
I'm an artist, so I paint all sorts of things. I'm currently working on some still life paintings, but I also like to do landscapes and portraits.
That's really cool! I've always admired people who can draw and paint. I wish I was more artistic.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to express yourself.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem! So, what's it like being a single parent?
It can be tough, but it's also really rewarding. I love spending time with my daughter and watching her grow up.
I bet. Kids are so much fun!
They are! I'm so glad I have her in my life.
Sounds like you're a great mom.
Well, I'm sure your daughter is lucky to have you.
It was nice talking to you! Have a great day!
